name: Asthenia
description:
Author: MrmediamanX of 3mx digital

;----------------------------------;
Asthenia is an abstract atmospheric short cinematic platformer written in blitz3d for PC.
plays similar to games like another world/out of this world and flashback.
;----------------------------------;
CONTROLS:
LEFT/RIGHT = MOVE
DOWN = DUCK
UP = JUMP_UP
Z = ACTION
LEFT/RIGHT+Z = RUN
WHILE RUNNING - UP = LONG JUMP
DOWN+Z=ROLL
;----------------------------------;
